segments.text: This is Mary . I just want to let you know that we made an offer to you . The salary is 3,000 yuan a month , I e-mailed the offer to you as well . You can let me know within a week if you accept the offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I'll go through it and tell you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We hope you get on board with us , Please let me know as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . Thank you for all .
segments.speaker: S2
